functions.population.preprocessing¶

Module for preprocessing remote sensing data, including reprojecting data to match microcensus grid.

Todo

  • Take vector road data as input and rasterize in pipeline.

  • Compute road density vs. distance to road.

Module Contents¶

functions.population.preprocessing.lcc_class_values¶

Maps raw Coepernicus LCC class values to simplified class values.

Type

dict

functions.population.preprocessing.lcc_class_names¶

Maps simplified class values to names.

Type

dict

functions.population.preprocessing.resamplers_table¶

Maps resmpler name to GDAL resampler code.

Type

dict

functions.population.preprocessing.ndvi_landsat_f(raster)¶

Calculate ndvi for landsat raster.

functions.population.preprocessing.ndwi_landsat_f(raster)¶

Calculate ndwi for landsat raster.

functions.population.preprocessing.indices_table¶

Maps index name to function that calculates it on Landsat data.

Type

dict

functions.population.preprocessing.reproject_data(in_dir, in_rasters, ref_rasters, out_dir, rois, resampling)¶

Reproject input rasters to the relevant reference grid, using dictated resampling method.

Parameters

  • in_dir (str) – The path to the input data directory.

  • in_rasters (str) – The names of input rasters within in_dir.

  • ref_rasters (list of str) – The path to reference grid for each roi.

  • out_dir (str) – The output directory.

  • rois (list of str) – The names of rois.

  • resampling (list of int) – The resampling technique code used for each input raster.

Returns

None.

functions.population.preprocessing.compute_indices(out_dir, filename, rois, indices)¶

Calculate listed indices for each roi using landsat data from filename.

Parameters

  • out_dir (str) – The out path for processed data, including indices.

  • filename (str) – The name of the landsat data in each roi’s directory.

  • rois (list of str) – The names of rois.

  • indices (list of str) – The names of indices to be computed (ndvi and ndwi supported).

Returns

None.

functions.population.preprocessing.compute_road_dist(out_dir, filename, rois)¶

Calculate distance to road for each roi using road data from filename.

Parameters

  • out_dir (str) – The out path for processed data.

  • filename (str) – The name of the road data in each roi’s directory.

  • rois (list of str) – The names of rois.

Returns

None.

functions.population.preprocessing.process_lcc(src_dir, filename, rois)¶

Process landcover classification by simplifying classes and saving to per-class rasters.

Parameters

  • src_dir (str) – The path to the directory containing lcc for each roi.

  • filename (str) – The name of the lcc in each roi’s directory.

  • rois (list of str) – The names of rois.

Returns

None.

functions.population.preprocessing.process_landsat(src_dir, filename, rois)¶

Split landsat data by saving to per-band rasters.

Parameters

  • src_dir (str) – The path to the directory containing landsat for each roi.

  • filename (str) – The name of the landsat raster in each roi’s directory.

  • rois (list) – The names of rois.

Returns

None.

functions.population.preprocessing.process_footprints(footprint_dirs, model_names, thresholds, pop_rasters, rois, out_dir)¶

Compute building footprint area for each roi for all tiles in footprints_dir.

Parameters

  • footprint_dirs (list of str) – The path to the footprint directory for each model.

  • model_names (list of str) – The name of each model.

  • thresholds (list of float) – The threshold used for each model.

  • pop_rasters (list of str) – The path to reference grid for each roi.

  • rois (list of str) – The names of rois.

  • out_dir (str) – The output directory.

Returns

None

functions.population.preprocessing.preprocess_data(params)¶

Preprocess data according to specifications in file params_path. All rasters output to disk.

Parameters

params (dict) – A dictionary holding parameters.

Returns

None.
